statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 21 \\ 5 \\ -9 \\ -19 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 9 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
